name: Khargi
languages: understands Abyssal and Infernal but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Leg attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Legs
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Swarming Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Exhales biting stinging insects in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 31 (9d6) poison (DC 16 Con half).

special_abilities.name: Deadly Infestation
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the khargi or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 7 (2d6) poison as stinging insects rise up to protect the khargi.

special_abilities.name: Death Swarms
special_abilities.desc: When it dies the insects crawling across and within it burst from its body forming 2d4 swarms of insects that appear in unoccupied spaces within 5 ft. of khargi's space.

special_abilities.name: Infested Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals + 2d6 poison (included below).
